concept.title: Instagram Rules
concept.shortdesc: You can create Stream rules that pull content from Instagram.

note.p: Before you create an Instagram stream, you must add at least one corporate Instagram account to the Social Accounts section in Network Settings. For more information on how to configure a social account, see Social Accounts.

conbody.p: Create Instagram Rules based on @mentions, hashtag, or location.
conbody.note: All Instagram rules require at least one hashtag. Adding keywords and a Username for your rule will return content which includes both entries.
conbody.p: To create Instagram Rules to pull content from Instagram feeds into your App or Folder, filter by:

ul.li: Enter hashtags to be included in, or excluded from your Instagram stream. Specifying values for both the Contains and Does not contain fields will return images which contain the first, and do not contain the second.

For example, entering Contains keywords Giants, Posey, and Does not contain keyword Dodger, will return all posts which include the word Giants or Posey, and do not include the word Dodger.Instagram Rules will return posts which include the listed hashtag in the author’s comments, which may not appear in the stream.
Enter @mentions to pull into the stream, or exclude from the stream.

Location. Choose one of the following:
Map location (city, zipcode, address, or geocode in the common latitude/longitude format (+/- 90, +/- 180) ). Begin typing a location to display a drop down menu with suggestions. Select a location from the drop down. The map displays a pin of that location. Adjust the slider to select a radius of one mile to three miles for each location. If you do not choose a radius, Livefyre automatically chooses a default of two miles.
You can add more than one location and radius. You can delete a location by clicking the X next to the name of a location in the box.
Combine the Is near this location and Is not near this location fields to pull content within locations in the Is near this location field, but not near the locations in the Is not near this location field.
For both fields, distance will be calculated from the center of the input location.
Check In Location
Enter the Instagram Place URL from Instagram. To find the Instagram Place URL:
Search Instagram for a specific check in location. For example, search in Instagram for “golden gate bridge.”
Select the check in location from the list. For example, select the check in location with the name “Golden Gate Bridge.”
Instagram takes you to the webpage for that check in location. There is a map pointing to the location and Instagram posts that have check-ins there. The URL contains a number. This number is the number to put in the Instagram Place URL field. For example, for the Golden Gate Bridge check in location, the URL is http://www.instagram.com/explore/locations/16839381/golden-gate-bridge/.
Select whether you would like to include All Content, Videos Only, or Photos Only in your stream.

conbody.p: For additional Stream rule options for all Stream rules, see Stream Rule Options for All Stream Rules.
